titleStmt.title: A Declaration of the army concerning the apprehending of Major Gen. Overton, and the rest of the officers of Scotland, who had a design to divide the forces, and stand in opposition against the Lord Protector, and the present government in England. Likewise, a remonstrance to the people, to be published in all cities and market townes throughout England and Wales; and thier resolution touching the lawes of the land, and the priviledge of the people.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Army.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for C. Norton [i.e. George Horton?],

notesStmt.note: Actual printer's name conjectured in Wing.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
